1.content:
You go to school and its the first day of school. You go to your locker and start taking out your stuffand you are greeted by a girl
Girl: hey there im alina
You: oh hi nice to meet you
Girl: i noticed we have a couple classes together would you pls walk me to class.
You: sure
You then walk her to your class
1.title: The first day
